application.description: The platform dedicated to the organisation of Pix Certification sessions. Pix Certif allows you to create and manage certification sessions.

api-error-messages.CANDIDATE_NOT_ALLOWED_FOR_FINALIZED_SESS: This session has already been finalised and no new candidates may be added.
api-error-messages.CANDIDATE_NOT_FOUND: An error has occurred, the candidate {firstName} {lastName} hasn't been found.
api-error-messages.INVALID_DOCUMENT:
This version of the document is unknown.
Please download and import the candidate list template again
api-error-messages.SESSION_ALREADY_FINALIZED: Cannot finalise session more than once.
api-error-messages.SESSION_CANNOT_BE_FINALIZED: Error during the finalisation of the session.
api-error-messages.SESSION_DOES_NOT_EXIST_OR_ACCESS_RESTRIC: The session doesn't exist or it's access is restricted.
api-error-messages.SESSION_STARTED_CANDIDATE_ALREADY_LINKED:
The session has begun, you can’t upload a candidates' list anymore.
If you want to edit the list, you can enrol a candidate directly in the table below.
api-error-messages.SESSION_WITHOUT_STARTED_CERTIFICATION: This session hasn't started, you can't finalise it. However, you may delete it.
api-error-messages.SESSION_WITH_ABORT_REASON_ON_COMPLETED_C: The field "Reason for abandonment" has been filled in for a candidate who has finished their certification exam in between. The session therefore can't be finalised. Please refresh the page before finalising.
api-error-messages.UNTERMINATED_CERTIFICATION_WITHOUT_ABORT: One or more unterminated certifications have missing "Abandon reason". The session cannot be finalised
api-error-messages.authorize-resume-error: An error has occurred, {firstName} {lastName} couldn't be allowed to resume his/her Pix certification exam.
api-error-messages.bad-request-error: The data entered was not in the correct format.

certification-candidate.CANDIDATE_BILLING_MODE_MUST_BE_A_STRING: The field "Pricing of Pix’s share" is invalid
certification-candidate.CANDIDATE_BILLING_MODE_NOT_VALID: The field "Pricing of Pix’s share" can only contain one of the following values : Free, Payable, Prepaid.
certification-candidate.CANDIDATE_BILLING_MODE_REQUIRED: The field "Pricing of Pix’s share" is required
certification-candidate.CANDIDATE_BIRTHDATE_FORMAT_NOT_VALID: The field "Date of birth" must be in DD/MM/YYYY format.
certification-candidate.CANDIDATE_BIRTHDATE_MUST_BE_GREATER: The field "Date of birth" must be greater than 01/01/1900
certification-candidate.CANDIDATE_BIRTHDATE_REQUIRED: The field "Date of birth" is required
certification-candidate.CANDIDATE_BIRTH_CITY_REQUIRED: The field "Name of birth city" is required
certification-candidate.CANDIDATE_BIRTH_INFORMATION_REQUIRED: Fill in the candidate’s birth information
certification-candidate.CANDIDATE_BIRTH_INSEE_CODE_OR_BIRTH_POST: Fill in either an INSEE code or a postcode and the name of the birth city
certification-candidate.CANDIDATE_BIRTH_POSTAL_CODE_CITY_NOT_VAL: The postcode "{birthPostalCode}" doesn’t match with the city "{birthCity}"
certification-candidate.CANDIDATE_EXTERNAL_ID_MUST_BE_A_STRING: The field "External user ID" is invalid
certification-candidate.CANDIDATE_EXTRA_TIME_OUT_OF_RANGE: The field "Extra time" is invalid (format accepted example: 30%)
certification-candidate.CANDIDATE_FOREIGN_BIRTH_CITY_REQUIRED: Candidate born abroad, the field "Birth city" is required
certification-candidate.CANDIDATE_FOREIGN_INSEE_CODE_NOT_VALID: The value of the INSEE code must be "99" for any birth country other than France
certification-candidate.CANDIDATE_FOREIGN_POSTAL_CODE_MUST_BE_EM: Candidate born abroad, the field "Postcode" must stay blank
certification-candidate.CANDIDATE_MAX_ONE_COMPLEMENTARY_CERTIFIC: You cannot register a candidate for more than one complementary certification
certification-candidate.CANDIDATE_PREPAYMENT_CODE_MUST_BE_EMPTY: The field "Prepayment code" must remain blank since the "Prepaid" option hasn't been selected for this candidate
certification-candidate.CANDIDATE_PREPAYMENT_CODE_REQUIRED: The field "Prepayment code" is required since the "Prepaid" option has been selected for this candidate
certification-candidate.CANDIDATE_RESULT_RECIPIENT_EMAIL_NOT_VAL: The email of the results' recipient (instructor, teacher…)" "{value}" is invalid
certification-candidate.CANDIDATE_SEX_NOT_VALID: The field "Gender" accepts the values "M" for a man or "F" for a woman
certification-candidate.DUPLICATE_CANDIDATE: Please delete duplicate candidate(s) before re-uploading

api-error-messages.gateway-timeout-error: The service is being slow. Please try again later.
api-error-messages.internal-server-error: An error occurred, our teams are working on finding a solution. Please try again later.
api-error-messages.login-unauthorized-error: There was an error in the email address or password entered.
api-error-messages.login-user-blocked-error: Your account has reached the maximum number of failed login attempts and has been temporarily blocked. Please '<'a href="{url}"'>'contact us'' to unblock it.
api-error-messages.login-user-temporary-blocked-error: You have reached too many failed login attempts. Please try again later or '<'a href="{url}"'>'reset your password here''.

category-labels.non-blocking-candidate-issue: Non-blocking incident linked to the candidate
category-labels.signature-issue: Was present but forgot to sign or signed on the wrong line

errors.add-reporting: An error occurred while adding a reporting. Please try again.

non-blocking-issues.candidate-examples: Left temporarily, under invigilation, the exam room, arrived late, encountered difficulties to connect to the session, had to reconnect to the session, had forgotten their password…
non-blocking-issues.candidate-information: Reporting on an indicative basis, the problem encountered didn’t prevent the candidate from continuing to answer the questions.
non-blocking-issues.technical-examples: The computer switched off, significant slowness of the network and/or of the machine etc…
non-blocking-issues.technical-information: Reporting on an indicative basis, the problem encountered didn’t prevent the candidate from continuing to answer the questions. As a reminder, any technical incident with a question must be reported live during the session, using the Invigilator’s Portal.

subcategory-labels.accessibility-issue: Problem with the accessibility of the question (ex : colour blindness)
subcategory-labels.extra-time-exceeded: The candidate profits from extra time and hasn’t been able to answer the question within the time allocated
subcategory-labels.file-not-opening: The file to download can’t be downloaded or doesn’t open
subcategory-labels.name-or-birthdate: Edit the first name/last name/date of birth
subcategory-labels.skip-on-oops: A technical problem due to the Pix platform prevented the candidate from answering the question
subcategory-labels.software-not-working: The software installed on the computer didn’t work
subcategory-labels.unintentional-focus-out: The candidate was forced to click outside the authorised frame for a focus mode question
subcategory-labels.website-blocked: The website is blocked by the establishment’s network restrictions (social media for ex.)
subcategory-labels.website-unavailable: The website to visit is unavailable/under maintenance/unreachable

candidates-joining-issue.label: At least one candidate was present during the certification session but couldn’t join the session.

(PDF, 66ko).''

complementary-information.description: You may indicate, if need be, the events that occurred during the session. It isn’t necessary to report any missing candidates.
complementary-information.incident: Despite an incident having occurred during the session, the candidates have been able to finish their Pix certification exam. Additional time has been granted to at least one of the candidates.
complementary-information.title: Additional information (optional)

confirm-finalisation-modal.information: you won’t be able to edit these informations thereafter. Processing time is needed before the results can be made available by Pix (this processing time may vary from one session to another).

notification.success: The session's details have been successfully transmitted.

reporting.description: For the reporting to be taken into account, you must use the appropriate reporting category (examples : C1, C2, etc).

leave-certification-center.message:
Are you sure you want to leave this Pix Certif space? You will no longer have access to {certificationCenterName}.

Your sessions remain accessible to the rest of the team.

Your access to other Pix Certif spaces will not be affected.

You'll be disconnected.

no-referer-section.description: The referent for this dual certification will be notified when Pix-CléA Numérique results are available and need to be registered on the CléA Numérique platform.
no-referer-section.title: No referent designated for Pix-CléA Numérique certification

notifications.success: A new CléA Numérique referent has been appointed.

team.pix-referer-tooltip: The referent for this dual certification will be notified when Pix-CléA Numérique results are available and need to be registered on the CléA Numérique platform.

select-referer-modal.description:
Le Groupement d’intérêt public, sis 21-23 rue des Ardennes 75019 Paris PIX met en œuvre en tant que responsable de traitement un traitement de données à caractère personnel portant sur votre adresse email professionnel de référent Pix.
La finalité de ce traitement est la communication des informations nécessaires aux attributions du référent Pix au sein du centre de certification agréé. Le traitement de cette données repose sur l’exécution de la convention d’agrément de votre centre de certification.
Les données sont conservées pendant la durée de la convention d’agrément en vigueur entre le GIP Pix et le centre habilité auquel vous êtes rattaché.
Vous disposez de droits personnels, droits d'accès, de rectification et d’effacement des données, le droit de limitation ou d’opposition au traitement pour motif légitime et le droit d’introduire une réclamation auprès d’une autorité de contrôle ainsi que le droit de définir des directives relatives à la conservation, à l'effacement et à la communication de vos données à caractère personnel en cas de décès que vous pouvez exercer par courriel auprès de notre DPD en adressant votre demande à l’adresse électronique suivante : dpd@pix.fr .
Vous disposez de la possibilité d’introduire une réclamation auprès de Commission nationale Informatique et libertés « CNIL » à l’adresse suivante : 3 Place de Fontenoy – TSA 80715 – 75334 Paris Cedex 07.
select-referer-modal.label: Select the CléA Numérique referent
select-referer-modal.title: CléA Numérique referent selection

table.caption: Table listing the members of the certification centre. It includes the first and last name of the member and the role. If the logged-in user has an administrator role, there is an action column for changing a member's role, deleting a member from the space or leaving the certification space. If the centre has CléA accreditation, the table will include the referent.

team.title: Team

table.caption: Table listing pending invitations to join the certification centre as a member. It includes the email address of the invited user, the date the invitation was last sent and the actions for resending or deleting the invitation

team-invite.email-requirement: Enter here the email address of the member you want to invite.
team-invite.invited-members: By clicking on the link provided in the invitation, the invited members will be able to create an account or log in with an existing Pix account.

invitations.invalid-email-domain: The domain of one or more e-mail addresses is incorrect.
invitations.invalid-email-format: The format of one or more e-mail addresses is incorrect.
invitations.mailer-provider-unavailable: The e-mail service is currently unavailable. Please try again later.

success.invitations: An invitation has been sent to the {emailsCount, plural, one {e-mail address {email}.} other {e-mail addresses listed.}}

team-invite.several-email-requirement: Invite several members by separating the email addresses with commas.

actions.accept: I accept the terms and conditions of use

terms-of-service.title: Terms and conditions of use of the Pix Certif platform

restricted-access: Site under maintenance, your Pix Certif space will reopen on {date}.
